content: the sunbeams granny square uses front post double_crochet stitches emanating from the centre of the square to symbolise the sun s rays it is a happy square which can be used to make lots of crochet projects it is an advanced beginner pattern and uses single half double double and treble_crochet stitches together with front post double_crochet stitches all stitches are explained in detail in the pattern notes with photo tutorials pattern in us terminology the dimensions are 10x10cm/4 x4 using fingering weight/4 ply yarn 18-25m in total and a 3 0mm hook other weight yarn could be used
